en: Hardly can I find new faces here.
If I am to support you in your wayfaring, I advise you to at the very least fetch some materials and make the trek easy.
Run along! Chop chop, friend, I'm going to need 5 sticks and 5 pieces of wood!
I assure you, if I could, I would sprint and chop down the forest for your wood, but my legs have faded with age.
A youthful spirit indeed! With this many resources, I can create three weapons!
There is a orcish outpost with treasure ahead, though the path is dangerous. Good luck on your travels! May Lady Luck be on your side.
...  you  took  every  thing  from  me  ...
A stick found in the outskirts of Rhymore.
A loose piece of wood from the outskirts of Rhymore.
A blade crafted from wood, with fiber holding it together.
A small bow made from wood strips. It fires crude but deadly wooden arrows.
A stick curved by magical forces. Magic can be channeled through it to conjure flames.
A wood carving bound with century old magic. The blood of a bear god rests on it.
Your Attacks Inflict Bleeding and Ruptured
Your Attacks Inflict Bleeding, Ruptured, and Blood Curse
